h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **Defeat the Tiger's Acolyte and follow the Old-Rattle Drum questline to uncover three spots. This will reveal a well, where you can drop down and defeat the Mad Tiger.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Buried in the Sand'.
The content is as follows:
**Defeat the Tiger's Acolyte and follow the Old-Rattle Drum questline to uncover three spots. This will reveal a well, where you can drop down and defeat the Mad Tiger.**
